Room.Name: Mountain Trail
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking around the southern portion of a large mountain.
Room.LongDescription: The large Ituk Glacier comes into view as you round the southern end of the large mountain you are walking around. The path you are on continues around the mountain. A small path leads down the mountain onto the glacier. The glacier is notorious for its ferocious predators in search of a scrap of food.
